channel.title: I want to add castle wars to my server but..how do I?
channel.description: Ok I've just made my server and so far people LOVE IT!! But I want to add a castle wars minigame!! But it needs to work properly... I know how to just change where a teleporting speel takes you so I can make it take you to castle wars but does anyone know a ood tutorial for adding castle? r can you just tell me here?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 28, 2007, 07:53:10 PM[/size][hr]Anyone?

Ok so this is what you do… you code it yourself, compile it, if it works, gj test it, then if it dont work edit some stuffs, then re do it…

Figure it our yourself, no one has coded it properly yet… (probs becaue noobs leech…)

item.title: I want to add castle wars to my server but..how do I?
item.dc:creator: @ChemicalReaction1 ChemicalReaction™
item.description:
@ChemicalReaction1 wrote:

Sorta, i can tell you HOW, but im not doing it, if none of the stairs/doords work, u need to add a case… making the door rotate so you can walk through. for stairs you need to make a teleport case. and for the flag you need a case to replace you weapon with the flag.
